com.apriori.util

Class IoStreams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apriori.util.IoStreams

  • public final class IoStreams
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for working with I/O streams. There are helper methods for binary streams (InputStream and OutputStream) and for text streams ( Reader/Readable and Writer/Appendable).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long copyBytes(java.io.InputStream in, java.io.OutputStream out)
      Copies binary data by reading from one stream and writing to another.
      static long copyText(java.lang.Readable in, java.lang.Appendable out)
      Copies text data by reading from one stream and writing to another.
      static byte[] toByteArray(java.io.InputStream in)
      Fully consumes the specified stream and returns the results as a byte array.
      static byte[] toByteArray(java.lang.Readable in, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Fully consumes the specified stream and returns the results as a byte array.
      static java.lang.String toString(java.io.InputStream in, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Fully consumes the specified stream and returns the results as a string.
      static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Readable in)
      Fully consumes the specified stream and returns the results as a string.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • copyBytes

        public static long copyBytes(java.io.InputStream in,
                             java.io.OutputStream out)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Copies binary data by reading from one stream and writing to another.
        Parameters:
        in - the source of data
        out - the target to which data is copied
        Returns:
        the total number of bytes copied
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an exception is thrown trying to read or write from the streams

      • copyText

        public static long copyText(java.lang.Readable in,
                            java.lang.Appendable out)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Copies text data by reading from one stream and writing to another.
        Parameters:
        in - the source of data
        out - the target to which data is copied
        Returns:
        the total number of characters copied
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an exception is thrown trying to read or write from the streams

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Readable in)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Fully consumes the specified stream and returns the results as a string.
        Parameters:
        in - the stream to read
        Returns:
        the contents of the stream as a string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an exception is thrown trying to read from the stream

      • toString

                                        java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Fully consumes the specified stream and returns the results as a string.
        Parameters:
        in - the stream to read
        charset - the character set used to decode binary data as characters
        Returns:
        the contents of the stream as a string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an exception is thrown trying to read from the stream

                          throws java.io.IOException
        Fully consumes the specified stream and returns the results as a byte array.
        Parameters:
        in - the stream to read
        charset - the character set used to encode text as bytes
        Returns:
        the contents of the stream as an array of bytes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an exception is thrown trying to read from the stream
